name: Fright Light
description: Experience an intense, strategy dependent game disguised as a cheesy parody of all those jump scare "games" we love to laugh at. Master the art of tracking up to four intruders at once along with timing your flashlight reloads for maximum protection from your enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Yes

reviews.review_text: Not at all a good game, but it's fun since it's cheesy.

if this game was over a doller i wouldn't have bought it, i dont typically like these types of games and 5 nights at freddy's always seems boring to me. however i was suprised by this game's charm, the idea of using real photos really worked for this game it has a nice campy vibe. i probably won't play much more of this game but for the price i should definitely check it out.
